2+1.sig_info: While in Cosmic Energy Overload, Super-Skrull gains a Power Gain Buff, granting 1.05 to 3.6% of a Bar of Power per second.

PASSIVE: Immune to Shock, Incinerate effects.
Fury Buffs also grant +49.48 Block Penetration.
Armor Up Buffs also grant +84.21 Critical Resistance.
HYPNOTIC GAZE - DEBUFF: After a cooldown of 25 seconds inflict a Falter Debuff on the Opponent. This Falter Debuff lasts for 1 seconds, causes all attacks to Miss and begins Paused.
Falter is unpaused when Skrull is Struck, Blocks an Attack, or an Opponent Misses.
When this Falter expires, there is a 100% chance that it's replaced with an Energy Vulnerability Debuff reducing Energy Resistance by 1066.67 for 5 seconds.
COSMIC ENERGY RECEPTORS - BUFF: Every 1 second(s) Super-Skrull reaches full charge, and his next action creates a Buff, resetting the charge. This charge is not affected by Ability Accuracy.
Landing a Hit or Striking a Block converts to a Fury Buff increasing Attack by 11.36.
Being Struck by or Blocking an Attack converts to an Armor Up Buff increasing Armor by 304.76.
5 of these Buffs can be maintained at a time.
COSMIC ENERGY OVERLOAD - BUFF: Upon reaching his Cosmic Energy Receptor Buff limit Skrull gains a Cosmic Energy Overload Buff for 15 seconds, and cannot build any more Cosmic Energy until it ends.
All Cosmic Energy Receptor Buffs are removed when Overload ends or if it fails to trigger.
Skrull gains additional Buffs based on the Armor Up or Fury Buffs active when he enters Overload:
4+ Armor Up Buffs: Gain a Vigilance Buff preventing their attacks from Missing for 15 seconds.
8+ Armor Up Buffs: Gain an Unblockable Buff for 15 seconds.
4+ Fury Buffs: Gain an Undermine Debuff for 15 seconds, granting Unblockable to any Hit which the Opponent Autoblocks.

8+ Fury Buffs: Gain a Nova Fists Buff for 15 seconds. Granting a 100% chance to Incinerate on all attacks, dealing 37.54 energy damage over 1.5 seconds, removing Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On Activation convert up to 5 Fury Buffs into Armor Up Buffs increasing Armor by 304.76 for 25 seconds.
The second hit of this attack Cannot Miss or be Autoblocked.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On Activation convert up to 5 Armor Up Buffs into Fury Buffs increasing Attack by 11.36 for 25 seconds.
Each hit has a 100% chance to cause an Incinerate on Hit doing 90.53 Energy Damage over 15 seconds, removing Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain an indefinite non-stacking Aptitude increasing the potency of future Armor Up, Fury, and Precision Buffs by 60%.
100% chance to Stun for 3 second(s).

The second hit of this attack Cannot Miss or be Autoblocked.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On Activation convert up to 5 Armor Up Buffs into Fury Buffs increasing Attack by 8.8 for 25 seconds.
Each hit has a 100% chance to cause an Incinerate on Hit doing 70.13 Energy Damage over 15 seconds, removing Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain an indefinite non-stacking Aptitude increasing the potency of future Armor Up, Fury, and Precision Buffs by 60%.
100% chance to Stun for 3 second(s).

PASSIVE: Immune to Shock, Incinerate effects.
Fury Buffs also grant +49.48 Block Penetration.
Armor Up Buffs also grant +84.21 Critical Resistance.
HYPNOTIC GAZE - DEBUFF: After a cooldown of 25 seconds inflict a Falter Debuff on the Opponent. This Falter Debuff lasts for 1 seconds, causes all attacks to Miss and begins Paused.
Falter is unpaused when Skrull is Struck, Blocks an Attack, or an Opponent Misses.
When this Falter expires, there is a 100% chance that it's replaced with an Energy Vulnerability Debuff reducing Energy Resistance by 1066.67 for 5 seconds.
COSMIC ENERGY RECEPTORS - BUFF: Every 1 second(s) Super-Skrull reaches full charge, and his next action creates a Buff, resetting the charge. This charge is not affected by Ability Accuracy.
Landing a Hit or Striking a Block converts to a Fury Buff increasing Attack by 12.16.
Being Struck by or Blocking an Attack converts to an Armor Up Buff increasing Armor by 304.76.
5 of these Buffs can be maintained at a time.
COSMIC ENERGY OVERLOAD - BUFF: Upon reaching his Cosmic Energy Receptor Buff limit Skrull gains a Cosmic Energy Overload Buff for 15 seconds, and cannot build any more Cosmic Energy until it ends.
All Cosmic Energy Receptor Buffs are removed when Overload ends or if it fails to trigger.
Skrull gains additional Buffs based on the Armor Up or Fury Buffs active when he enters Overload:
4+ Armor Up Buffs: Gain a Vigilance Buff preventing their attacks from Missing for 15 seconds.
8+ Armor Up Buffs: Gain an Unblockable Buff for 15 seconds.
4+ Fury Buffs: Gain an Undermine Debuff for 15 seconds, granting Unblockable to any Hit which the Opponent Autoblocks.

8+ Fury Buffs: Gain a Nova Fists Buff for 15 seconds. Granting a 100% chance to Incinerate on all attacks, dealing 40.19 energy damage over 1.5 seconds, removing Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On Activation convert up to 5 Fury Buffs into Armor Up Buffs increasing Armor by 304.76 for 25 seconds.
The second hit of this attack Cannot Miss or be Autoblocked.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On Activation convert up to 5 Armor Up Buffs into Fury Buffs increasing Attack by 12.16 for 25 seconds.
Each hit has a 100% chance to cause an Incinerate on Hit doing 96.9 Energy Damage over 15 seconds, removing Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain an indefinite non-stacking Aptitude increasing the potency of future Armor Up, Fury, and Precision Buffs by 60%.
100% chance to Stun for 3 second(s).
